alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 22 at 6:02PM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24 expected. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Inland Kenedy, Inland Willacy and Coastal Kenedy Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to noon CST Friday. For the Wind Advisory, from 8 PM until 9 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Kenedy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy
